00047 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00048 class PageInstrumentationTestCase: public PAGETESTCASE {
00049   private:
00050     gaia::base::String mPageClass;
00051     bool mInitialTouchMode;
00052     Demand* mpPageDemand;

00055     virtual ~PageInstrumentationTestCase();

00100         mInitialTouchMode = initialTouchMode;
00101     }

00104     virtual void SetUp();
00105     virtual void TearDown();

00110 using gaia::core::Persistence;

00113 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00114 PageInstrumentationTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::
00115         PageInstrumentationTestCase()
00116         : mPageClass(gaia::core::GetClassName<TestPage>())
00117           , mInitialTouchMode(false)
00118           , mpPageDemand(NULL) {
00119 }
00120 
00121 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00122 PageInstrumentationTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::
00123         ~PageInstrumentationTestCase() {
00124 }
00125 
00126 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00127 TestPage* PageInstrumentationTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::getPage() {
00128     GLOGENTRY("PageInstrumentationTestCase");
00129     Page* page = PageTestCase < TestFixture > ::getPage();
00130     if (page == NULL) {
00131         // set initial touch mode
00132         this->getInstrumentation()->setInTouchMode(mInitialTouchMode);
00133         String targetPackage =
00134                 this->getInstrumentation()->
00135                 getTargetContext()->getPackageName();
00136         if (mpPageDemand == NULL) {
00137             page = this->launchPage(targetPackage, mPageClass, NULL);
00138         } else {
00139             page = this->launchPageWithDemand(targetPackage, mPageClass,
00140                     mpPageDemand);
00141         }
00142         this->setPage(page);
00143     }
00144     return static_cast<TestPage*>(page);
00145 }
00146 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00147 void PageInstrumentationTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::SetUp() {
00148     PageTestCase < TestFixture > ::SetUp();
00149     mInitialTouchMode = false;
00150     mpPageDemand = NULL;
00151 }
00152 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00153 void PageInstrumentationTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::TearDown() {
00154     Page* page = PageTestCase < TestFixture > ::getPage();
00155     if (page != NULL) {
00156         page->finish();
00157         this->setPage(NULL);
00158     }
00159     PageTestCase<TestFixture>::TearDown();
00160 }
